## floatTexture variable

Creates &amp; configure a new FLOAT texture.

\*\*Important:\*\* Since each texel will hold 4x 32-bit float values, the `data` buffer needs to have a length of at least `4 * width * height`<!-- -->.

Under WebGL 1.0, we assume the caller has previously enabled the `OES_texture_float` extension.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
floatTexture: (gl: WebGLRenderingContext, data: Float32Array | null | undefined, width: number, height: number, format?: TextureFormat | undefined, type?: TextureType | undefined) => Texture
```
